Ingredients.1: 6  Red Delicious apples - peeled, cored, and cut into cubes

Ingredients.2: 4  Asian pears - peeled, cored, and cut into cubes

Directions.1: Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat. Stir apples, Asian pears, and apple cider together in the skillet until the fruit is mushy, about 10 minutes.

Directions.2: Smash the apples and pears with the back of a wooden spoon until no large chunks remain; continue cooking until thickened, 20 to 30 minutes more.

Directions.3: Stir sugar and cinnamon into the sauce; cook, stirring occasionally, until the sugar dissolves completely, 5 to 7 minutes more.
